mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment.basicPitchLcsAligner

Class Transcriber

  • java.lang.Object
    • mpmToolbox.projectData.alignment.basicPitchLcsAligner.Transcriber

  • class Transcriber
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of the Basic Pitch audio-to-MIDI transcription algorithm that uses model weights exported to ONNX format.

    Original source code.

    Citation: @inproceedings{2022_BittnerBRME_LightweightNoteTranscription_ICASSP, author= {Bittner, Rachel M. and Bosch, Juan Jos\'e and Rubinstein, David and Meseguer-Brocal, Gabriel and Ewert, Sebastian}, title= {A Lightweight Instrument-Agnostic Model for Polyphonic Note Transcription and Multipitch Estimation}, booktitle= {Proceedings of the IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing (ICASSP)}, address= {Singapore}, year= 2022, }

    Author:
    Vladimir Viro

      • getAudioInput

                                       int overlapLen,
                                       int hopSize)
        Gets the audio input by copying the specified audio file, extending it, and windowing it.
        Parameters:
        audioOriginal - The original audio file to be copied and extended.
        overlapLen - The length of the overlap.
        hopSize - The size of the hop.
        Returns:
        The audio input as a 2D array of floats.

      • readWaveFile

        private static float[] readWaveFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                                    int targetSamplingRate)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
        Reads the specified wave file and converts it to a float array.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path of the wave file to be read.
        targetSamplingRate - The target sampling rate to which the audio should be converted.
        Returns:
        The audio as a float array.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the audio file is not supported.

      • processWithProgress

        public Transcriber.TranscriptionOutput processWithProgress(double[] audio,
                                                           int sampleRate,
                                                           java.lang.String audioId,
                                                           int minNoteLen,
                                                           double onsetThresh,
                                                           double frameThresh,
                                                           int minPitch,
                                                           int maxPitch,
                                                           boolean reuseModelOutput,
                                                           java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void> onLabel,
                                                           java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Void> onProgress,
                                                           java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void> onDone)
        The main transcription method.
        Parameters:
        audio - The mono audio data
        sampleRate - The sample rate of the audio file
        minNoteLen - The minimum length (in seconds) of notes to transcribe
        onsetThresh - The onset threshold to be passed to this.modelOutputToNotes
        frameThresh - The frame threshold to be passed to this.modelOutputToNotes
        reuseModelOutput - Whether to re-use the raw transcription output if available
        onLabel - A callback function that is called to display status information
        onProgress - A callback function that is called to update the progress bar
        onDone - A callback function that is called on transcription completion

      • freqToMidi

        private static int freqToMidi(double freq)

      • midiToFreq

        private static double midiToFreq(double midi)

      • outputToNotesPolyphonic

        public static java.util.List<Transcriber.NoteEvent> outputToNotesPolyphonic(float[][] frames,
                                                                            float[][] onsets,
                                                                            double onsetThresh,
                                                                            double frameThresh,
                                                                            int minNoteLen,
                                                                            boolean inferOnsets,
                                                                            double maxFreq,
                                                                            double minFreq,
                                                                            boolean melodiaTrick,
                                                                            java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Void> onProgress)
        Converts the output of the neural network into a list of notes.
        Parameters:
        frames - the frames output by the neural network
        onsets - the onsets output by the neural network
        onsetThresh - the threshold for an onset to be considered valid
        frameThresh - the threshold for a frame to be considered valid
        minNoteLen - the minimum length a note must be to be considered valid
        inferOnsets - whether or not to infer onsets from the frames
        maxFreq - the maximum frequency of a note
        minFreq - the minimum frequency of a note
        melodiaTrick - whether or not to use the Melodia trick to improve onset detection
        onProgress - a function that is called each time the progress is updated
        Returns:
        a list of notes

                                          float[][] frames)

        Parameters:

        frames - the frames to use for inference
        Returns:

      • modelOutputToNotes

        private static java.util.List<Transcriber.NoteEventWithTime> modelOutputToNotes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,float[][]> output,
                                                                                double onsetThresh,
                                                                                double frameThresh,
                                                                                boolean inferOnsets,
                                                                                int minNoteLen,
                                                                                double minFreq,
                                                                                double maxFreq,
                                                                                boolean melodiaTrick,
                                                                                java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Void> onProgress)
        Converts model output to a list of notes with timestamps.
        Parameters:
        output - the model output map
        onsetThresh - the onset threshold
        frameThresh - the frame threshold
        inferOnsets - whether to infer onsets
        minNoteLen - the minimum length of a note
        minFreq - the minimum frequency of a note
        maxFreq - the maximum frequency of a note
        melodiaTrick - whether to use the Melodia trick
        onProgress - a function to call on progress updates
        Returns:
        a list of notes with timestamps

        private static double[] modelFramesToTime(int nFrames)
        Converts the number of model frames to time values.
        Parameters:
        nFrames - The number of model frames.
        Returns:
        An array of time values.
